price: Na ikaletwa Jahannamu siku hiyo, siku hiyo mtu atakumbuka! Lakini kukumbuka huko kutamfaa nini?
arabic: وَجِاْيٓءَ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِجَهَنَّمَۚ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ
footnotes: Na siku hiyo iletwe Jahannamu, nyumba ya adhabu, siku hiyo yatapo tokea hayo mwanaadamu atakumbuka aliyo yaharibu - lakini wapi! Kukumbuka huko kumfae nini, na wakati umekwisha pita?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wajīa yawma-idhin bijahannama yawma-idhin yatadhakkaru al-insānu wa-annā lahu al-dhik'rā
